titles.title: To suspend until January 1, 1998, the duty on certain composite diagnostic or laboratory reagents.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 4/28/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1997, the duty on certain composite diagnostic or laboratory reagents.
